description: Celestial Nighthawk synergizes with Still Hunt by solar synergy. Focus on igniting enemies and sustaining through Solar restoration. Deliver precision eliminations with enhanced damage. Your aspects (Knock 'Em Down + On Your Mark) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: Ability: Golden Gun, **GOD ROLL**: God Roll: Still Hunt's Golden Gun shot benefits from Nighthawk's massive damage boost.

Lucky Pants synergizes with Malfeasance by ability: neutral / any. Focus on versatile damage output. Tether enemies and suppress their abilities. Your aspects (Vanishing Step + Stylish Executioner) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: God Roll: Illegal Holster applies massive damage stacks to Malfeasance shots., Buffs Hand Cannon

Lucky Pants synergizes with The Last Word by ability: neutral / any. Focus on versatile damage output. Tether enemies and suppress their abilities. Your aspects (Vanishing Step + Stylish Executioner) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: God Roll: Hand Cannon damage boost makes Last Word a DPS monster., Buffs Hand Cannon

Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: God Roll: Volatile rounds on demand perfectly loops Collective Obligation's leach., Void Synergy
